sanityProject.title: Denver University Portfolio
sanityProject.body:
Immersive, bootcamp-style coding program focused towards the forefront of software and web development technologies. 
Educationally balanced between front-end development, back-end development and how to cohesively operate with a team of fellow coders. 
Transitioning from graphic design to a heavier focus in web development, Trilogy Education's program at Denver University was a catalyst in igniting passion and creativity while introducing tactical approaches to coded solutions.

imgGallery.title: Card randomizing, GIF-themed memory game.
imgGallery.caption: REACT GIF MEMORY GAME -  Card randomizing, GIF-themed memory game.  Click through a constantly randomizing bank of images without clicking the same one twice.

imgGallery.title: Scrapes the Onion for breaking political satire
imgGallery.caption: DICED ONIONS - App that scrapes recent political articles from the Onion and allows users to leave their comments.  Allows for user interaction via comment section.

imgGallery.title: Trivia game that asks Harry Potter related multiple choice questions
imgGallery.caption: HARRY POTTER TRIVIA - Trivia game that asks Harry Potter related multiple choice questions under the collapsing pressure of a 30 second timer.

imgGallery.title: API search engine that returns cards from either GIPHY or OMDB
imgGallery.caption: API FUN - API search engine that returns cards from either GIPHY or OMDB

imgGallery.title: Hangman-style game that takes on a Game of Thrones theme
imgGallery.caption: G.O.T. HANGMAN - Hangman-style game that takes on a Game of Thrones theme.
